trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName> event enables you to customize (or owner-draw) the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control in the details view.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen gjør at du kan tilpasse (eller eieren draw) utseendet til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen i detaljvisningen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control when its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `true` and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>denne hendelsen oppstår ved en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollerer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName>er satt til `true` og den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs passed to the event handler contains information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw and also provides methods to help you draw the subitem.
trans-unit.target: DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen inneholder informasjon om den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>til å tegne og gir deg også metoder for å hjelpe deg med å tegne subitem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Item%2A> properties to retrieve information about the parent item of the subitem to draw.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Item%2A>Egenskaper for å hente informasjon om overordnet element i subitem til å tegne.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Item%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> itself, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Til å hente den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>seg selv, bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Header%2A> property to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> representing the header of the column in which the subitem is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Header%2A>til å hente den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>som representerer hodet i kolonnen som vises i subitem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Header%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property to do the actual drawing within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A>til å utføre den faktiske tegningen innenfor området som er angitt av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: To draw standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> elements that do not need customization, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Til å tegne standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>elementer som ikke krever tilpasning, bruker du <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A> property when you want the operating system to draw the subitem.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A>Når du ønsker operativsystem for å tegne subitem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to customize only specific subitems.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig når du ønsker å tilpasse bare bestemte underelementene.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To avoid issues with graphics flickering when owner drawing, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Å unngå problemer med grafikk flimring overstyres tegning er eieren av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollere og angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This feature is available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne funksjonen er bare tilgjengelig på Windows XP og Windows Server 2003 familien når programmet kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Henter størrelsen og plasseringen av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>til å tegne.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The location specified by this property is relative to the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen angitt av denne egenskapen er i forhold til det øvre venstre hjørnet av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer grensene for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>til å tegne.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> column in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksen for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> kolonne der den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> column within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>kolonne i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Draws the background of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> using its current background color.
trans-unit.target: Tegner bakgrunn for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>ved hjelp av den gjeldende bakgrunnsfargen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw a standard background that uses the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å tegne en standardbakgrunn som bruker gjeldende verdi for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The background is drawn to fill the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bakgrunnen tegnes for å fylle området som er angitt av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> must be set to `false` to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value of the parent item from overriding the subitem value.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>-egenskapen til overordnet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>må settes til `false` å hindre at den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>verdien for det overordnede elementet overstyrer verdien subitem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> should be drawn by the operating system instead of owner-drawn.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>skal tegnes operativsystemet i stedet for eieren tegnes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this property when handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName> event for subitems that you do not want to customize.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen når behandling av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>hendelse for underelementene som du ikke vil tilpasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to `true`, the subitem will be drawn normally using the current values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> must be set to `false` to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value of the parent item from overriding the subitem value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter denne egenskapen til `true`, subitem skal tegnes normalt med gjeldende verdier for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Egenskaper > [!NOTE] > i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>-egenskapen til overordnet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>må settes til `false` å hindre at den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>verdien for det overordnede elementet overstyrer verdien subitem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the subitem should be drawn by the operating system; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis subitem skal tegnes av operativsystemet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Draws a focus rectangle for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> if the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> has focus.
trans-unit.target: Tegner Fokusrektangelet for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>Hvis overordnet <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> er i fokus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw a standard focus rectangle around the subitem.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å tegne et standard Fokusrektangelet rundt subitem.

trans-unit.source: The focus rectangle is drawn one pixel inside the area specified by the `bounds` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Fokusrektangelet er tegnet én pikselbredden inne i området som er angitt av den `bounds` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: It is drawn only when the parent item has focus, so you do not need to check the focus state of the item before you call this method.
trans-unit.target: Det vises bare når det overordnede elementet har fokus, så du ikke trenger å kontrollere fokus status for elementet før du kalle denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: You might want to draw the focus rectangle only around the first subitem (that is, the parent item, which is displayed in the first column) rather than drawing it around every subitem of an item.
trans-unit.target: Du bør til å tegne Fokusrektangelet bare rundt første subitem (det vil si det overordnede elementet som vises i den første kolonnen) i stedet for å tegne den rundt hver subitem til et element.

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to the normal behavior of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Samsvarer med normal virkemåten for en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollerer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A?displayProperty=fullName>er satt til `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To draw the focus rectangle around the first subitem, call the DrawFocusRectangle method only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> value is 0.
trans-unit.target: Tegn Fokusrektangelet rundt første subitem ved å kalle metoden DrawFocusRectangle bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>verdien er 0.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control does not provide the ability to select individual subitems, but if you want to implement subitem selection yourself, you can use this method to draw the focus rectangle around a subitem other than the first one.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>kontrollen ikke gir muligheten til å velge individuelle underelementene, men hvis du vil implementere subitem utvalget selv, kan du bruke denne metoden til å tegne Fokusrektangelet rundt subitem enn den første.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The area within which to draw the focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Området som brukes til å tegne Fokusrektangelet.

trans-unit.source: Draws the text of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> using its current foreground color.
trans-unit.target: Tegner teksten i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>ved hjelp av gjeldende forgrunnsfargen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw the subitem text using the current values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å tegne subitem-tekst ved hjelp av gjeldende verdier for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The text is drawn within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Teksten er tegnet i området som er angitt av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> must be set to `false` to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> values of the parent item from overriding the subitem values.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>-egenskapen til overordnet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>må settes til `false` å hindre at den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>verdiene i det overordnede elementet overstyrer subitem-verdier.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Draws the text of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> using its current foreground color and formatting it with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Tegner teksten i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>bruker gjeldende forgrunnsfargen og formatering med angitt <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"> </xref> verdier.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw the subitem text using the current values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å tegne subitem-tekst ved hjelp av gjeldende verdier for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The text is drawn within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Teksten er tegnet i området som er angitt av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> values specified in the `flags` parameter let you provide formatting properties for the node label, such as text alignment.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>verdiene i den `flags` parameteren lar deg angi formatering egenskaper for node-etiketten, for eksempel tekstjustering.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> must be set to `false` to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> values of the parent item from overriding the subitem values.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>-egenskapen til overordnet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>må settes til `false` å hindre at den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>verdiene i det overordnede elementet overstyrer subitem-verdier.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.UseItemStyleForSubItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> brukes til å tegne <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class provides properties and methods useful for drawing on the display device.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>klassen gir egenskaper og metoder som er nyttige for å tegne på visningsenheten.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> brukes til å tegne <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Gets the header of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> column in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Henter hodet til den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> kolonne der den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref> for the column in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref> for kolonnen der den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Henter overordnet <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>til å tegne.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> parent of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å få tilgang til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>overordnet for det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>til å tegne.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A> property does not provide adequate information to meet your needs.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>egenskapen inneholder ikke tilstrekkelig informasjon etter dine behov.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A> property provides only basic state information that you can use, for example, to determine whether the parent item is selected, checked, or focused.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>egenskapen gir bare grunnleggende informasjon om du kan for eksempel bruke til å fastsette om det overordnede elementet er valgt, kontrolleres eller fokuserer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ItemState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Item property, on the other hand, allows you to access all members of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen element derimot, får du tilgang til alle medlemmer av overordnet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: To access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> being drawn, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Access den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>blir tegnet, bruker du <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.SubItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> that represents the parent of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> som representerer overordnet for det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>til å tegne.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksen for overordnet <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>til å tegne.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: The index of the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for overordnet <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> samling.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Henter den gjeldende tilstanden til overordnet <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>til å tegne.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to check whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> parent of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw is in a particular state.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å kontrollere om det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>overordnede den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>til å tegne er i en bestemt tilstand.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: This property provides only basic state information about the parent item.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gir bare grunnleggende informasjon om det overordnede elementet.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property, for example, to determine whether the parent item is selected, checked, or focused.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen, for eksempel for å avgjøre om det overordnede elementet er valgt, kontrolleres eller fokus.

trans-unit.source: If you need to know more, retrieve the parent item through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A> property and check its properties directly.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil vite mer, kan du hente det overordnede elementet via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A>egenskapen og kontrollere egenskapene direkte.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"></xref> values indicating the current state of the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"> </xref> verdier som angir den gjeldende tilstanden til overordnet <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>til å tegne.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when the other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs> properties do not provide adequate information to meet your needs.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig når den andre <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs>Egenskaper gir ikke tilstrekkelig informasjon etter dine behov.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The SubItem property allows you to access all members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SubItem får du tilgang til alle medlemmer av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>som tegnes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>

trans-unit.source: You must access this object directly, for example, to draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value yourself rather than using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du må få tilgang til dette objektet direkte, for eksempel for å tegne den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>verdi selv enn den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>til å tegne.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>
